about_the_game:
The Dark Deity Digital Artbook features over 200 pages of art from Dark Deity, in various stages from finished to early concepts. Get a glimpse at the behind-the-scenes process of creating a game with 30 playable characters and a wide host of environments, including many pieces not viewable in-game.

Features

  • Character Art
  • Background Art
  • Story Illustrations
  • Early Concept Sketches
detailed_description:
The Dark Deity Digital Artbook features over 200 pages of art from Dark Deity, in various stages from finished to early concepts. Get a glimpse at the behind-the-scenes process of creating a game with 30 playable characters and a wide host of environments, including many pieces not viewable in-game.

Features

  • Character Art
  • Background Art
  • Story Illustrations
  • Early Concept Sketches
